title: CLASSES DURING AATMATRISHA
content: Do we have regular classes during the aatmatrisha week as well?

comments.body: This is PESU, don't keep high expectations... And yes there r normal classes, they tend to be a bit free depending on the teacher, but no free classes and stuff.

üôèüò≠

Kinda expected this kind of an answer
Atleast this time they have opened AT for outsidersü§ß

Last year it wasn't the case tho, maybe because of covid as u said.
